statements: UPDATE survey_data SET survey_name='Customer Satisfaction Survey', survey_date='2022-01-15' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE survey_data SET answer1='Agree' WHERE respondent_id=2 AND question1='Would you recommend our service?'
UPDATE survey_data SET survey_name = 'Customer Satisfaction Survey', survey_date = '2022-10-15', question1 = 'Overall Experience', answer1 = 'Good' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE SurveyData SET respondent_name = 'John Doe', question_1_response = 'Yes' WHERE survey_id = 1;
UPDATE SurveyMetaData SET survey_topic = 'Customer Satisfaction', survey_description = 'Feedback on product quality', survey_status = 'published' WHERE survey_id = 2;
UPDATE SurveyMetaData SET survey_status = 'published' WHERE survey_id = 101;
UPDATE SurveyData SET respondent_name = 'John Doe', question_1_response = 'Positive', question_2_response = 'Satisfied' WHERE survey_id = 201;
UPDATE survey_data SET survey_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE survey_id = 1;

UPDATE survey_data SET survey_date = '2022-05-10' WHERE survey_id = 1;
UPDATE participant_info SET join_date = '2022-06-15', participant_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE participant_id = 2;
UPDATE SurveyParticipants SET participant_name = 'Alice', age = 25 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE SurveyResponses SET response_text = 'Yes, I agree' WHERE participant_id = 10;
UPDATE SurveyParticipants SET age = 25, participant_name = 'John Doe' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE SurveyResponses SET response_text = 'Great response!', response_date = '2022-07-15' WHERE response_id = 5;
UPDATE survey_responses SET respondent_id = 1, response_text = 'Good', response_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE survey_questions SET question_type = 'Multiple Choice', question_text = 'What is your favorite color?', question_category = 'Personal Preference' WHERE id = 3
UPDATE survey_responses SET response_text = 'Good job!' WHERE respondent_id = 1 AND question_id = 5;
UPDATE survey_analysis SET analysis_description = 'Detailed analysis report for the survey' WHERE id = 3;
